name: assets-mapper
description: CLI and utility to auto-generate an assets map from a folder for React and Next.js projects with recursive scanning, file watching, and advanced configuration.

scripts.preuninstall: node -e "const {cleanupAssetsMap} = require('./lib/generator.js'); const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('src/assets-map.js')) cleanupAssetsMap('src/assets-map.js'); if (fs.existsSync('assets-map.js')) cleanupAssetsMap('assets-map.js');"
